internationalizations.title: My Resume Document.
internationalizations.description: Check out my downloadable resume document otherwise known as CV document. it basically highlights much which is already highlighted here in a more refined office standard kind of way.it is in pdf format trying my best to keep it short and precise. .

internationalizations.title: My Android App.
internationalizations.description: Check out my android application just a simple application showcasing my design constraints and also my resume in form of an apk. the application is written purely in java hosted on my github page where the source code can be traced with plans to do lots of future iterations.

internationalizations.title: Open CV.
internationalizations.description: OpenCV is the huge open-source library for the computer vision, machine learning, and image processing and now it plays a major role in real-time operation which is very important in today’s systems. By using it, one can process images and videos to identify objects, faces, or even handwriting of a human. When it integrated with various libraries, such as NumPy, python is capable of processing the OpenCV array structure for analysis. To Identify image pattern and its various features we use vector space and perform mathematical operations on these features.

internationalizations.title: Truth about Bitcoin.
internationalizations.description: Bitcoin, the original cryptocurrency, has been on a wild ride since its creation in 2009.As of today the total market value of all cryptocurrencies now exceeds $1.5 trillion, a staggering amount for virtual objects that are nothing more than computer code.Bitcoin was created (by a person or group that remains unidentified to this day) as a way to conduct transactions without the intervention of a trusted third party, such as a central bank or financial institution. Its emergence amid the global financial crisis, which shook trust in banks and even governments, was perfectly timed. Bitcoin enabled transactions using only digital identities, granting users some degree of anonymity. This made Bitcoin the preferred currency for illicit activities, including recent ransomware attacks. It powered the shadowy darknet of illegal online commerce much like PayPal helped the rise of eBay by making payments easier.

internationalizations.title: Demystifying Transformers: A Comprehensive Guide
internationalizations.description: Explore the intricacies of transformer models, including scaling laws, attention mechanisms, and fine-tuning techniques. This guide provides a deep dive into deploying and optimizing transformers for various applications.

internationalizations.title: How to Build Your Own GPT Model: A Step-by-Step Tech Guide
internationalizations.description: Master GPT model creation with this comprehensive guide. Learn essential skills, data preparation techniques, and deployment strategies to build and fine-tune your own GPT models effectively.

internationalizations.title: Overview of Large Language Models
internationalizations.description: Gain insights into large language models (LLMs) and their applications. This overview by NVIDIA discusses the architecture, training, and deployment of LLMs in modern AI systems.

internationalizations.title: Demystifying Transformers: A Visual Journey
internationalizations.description: A practical guide for better understanding embeddings, positional encoding, and attention mechanisms in transformer models.

internationalizations.title: Demystifying Transformers: A Practical Guide with TensorFlow Code
internationalizations.description: This article provides a deep dive into transformers, explaining their key components and offering hands-on code examples using TensorFlow.

internationalizations.title: How to Create a GPT Model? A Step-by-Step Guide
internationalizations.description: This blog post explains everything you need to know about building custom GPT models, their advantages, and how to choose the right GPT models that fit your needs.

internationalizations.title: Unraveling the Mysteries of Language Transformer Models
internationalizations.description: This book is a comprehensive guide aiming to demystify the world of transformers—the architecture that powers Large Language Models (LLMs) like GPT and BERT.

internationalizations.title: Step-by-Step Guide: How To Build A Custom GPT Model
internationalizations.description: Learn how to build a custom GPT with AI expert Tim Cakir and get better results from AI than an off-the-shelf model could ever generate.
